extracted_playbook.title: Run CHIRP on Relevant Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Execute CHIRP on systems running SolarWinds Orion or believed to be involved in any resulting lateral movement.

extracted_playbook.title: Ingest CHIRP Results
extracted_playbook.description: Upload the JSON results from CHIRP into a SIEM system, or view them in a compatible web browser or text editor if no SIEM is available.

extracted_playbook.condition: Did CHIRP detect any post-compromise threat activity?

extracted_playbook.title: Review and Confirm Detections
extracted_playbook.description: Review and confirm any detections of post-compromise threat activity identified by CHIRP.

extracted_playbook.title: Collect Forensic Image
extracted_playbook.description: For confirmed positive hits, collect a forensic image of the relevant system(s) and conduct a forensic analysis.
